link_name: Mappings for cisco nexus 9000 for Zabbix 3.2
link_desc:
I tried to import AuthorAndrey Amado's cisco nexus 9000 template:

https://share.zabbix.com/network_devices/cisco/template-cisco-nexus-9000

The value mappings are spread over a lot of little files contained in the zip file at the posting attached above, but they are a lot and need to be defined manually.

I wrote a little script to convert the files to a value map export. This file is attached. In Zabbix 3.2 you can import the value map first:

Administration -> General -> Value mapping (top right dropdown) -> Import

The template zip file also contains several regular expression definitions. I added these manually. There is an open ticket to support regular expression imports and exports, so there is no facility in Zabbix 3.2. They are just a few, and I added them manually at:

Administration -> General -> Regular Expressions -> New regular expression

Use expression type "Result is TRUE" for all of them (indicated by "RESULTADO is VERDADERO" in the files.) and copy&paste the expression into the web UI.

Note that one of the references for the value maps in the template xml file uses:

CISCO cefcPowerRedundancyMode

you need to change that to:

Cisco cefcPowerRedundancyMode

before importing the template.
